plot outline: This Is a movie based on the caste divide and the attrocities of the higher caste people on the poor and downtrodden low caste farmers. The movie is entirely based on a short story written by M.V.S Harinatha Rao a renowned playwright and writer.
title: Yerra Mandaram
plot: This Is a movie based on the caste divide and the attrocities of the higher caste people on the poor and downtrodden low caste farmers. The movie is entirely based on a short story written by M.V.S Harinatha Rao a renowned playwright and writer.::Jawahar Vijay Chikati
